label: social_support
src_text: Too bad about the stigma and illegality of what we do, cause i feels you.
augmented_text: "Remember that you're part of a community that cares deeply about you and wants to support you. Don't be afraid to ask for help when you need it. We're all in this together! 💜"

label: social_support
src_text: If she didn't think you were on her level she let you know it.
augmented_text: "Feeling overwhelmed? Let me know if I can help with anything, even just a listening ear 👂‍♀️"

label: social_support
src_text: I'm also glad that we have you in our community.
augmented_text: "Love seeing your smiling face at our weekly meetups! It brightens up my day every time."

label: social_support
src_text: Everyone be blessed and I hope your conditions improve and/or disappear.
augmented_text: May you find comfort in knowing you're not alone and that we're all rooting for you. 🤝

label: social_support
src_text: I've been trying to reconnect with my father's heritage, so I greatly appreciate your patience and cooperation.
augmented_text: "When times get tough, it's comforting to know we have friends like you who care about us deeply. Thanks for checking in on me today."

label: social_support
src_text: Sending my condolences, may you get through this tough time.
augmented_text: "Just wanted to check in on you and see how you're doing. Let me know if there's anything I can do to support you."

label: social_support
src_text: I understand this is frustrating, but you need to be your own advocate here.
augmented_text: "I hope you know that you're not alone in feeling overwhelmed. We all go through times like these, and it's okay to admit when we need a little extra support. Let me know if there's anything I can do to lighten your load."

label: social_support
src_text: Thank you for this incredible advice and putting some shit in my life into perspective.
augmented_text: "Thank you for sharing your story with me. It really helped put things into perspective and made me feel less alone."

label: social_support
src_text: Fix our education system and provide resources for the mentally ill. That ’ s how you solve these issues
augmented_text: "Everyone deserves access to clean water and sanitation. Let's work towards a future where this basic human right is guaranteed." #waterislife #sustainability

label: social_support
src_text: What other people think of you matters, we live in a global village.
augmented_text: "In times of trouble, don't forget that you have a network of friends and family who care about you. Lean on them for support! 💪 #strongerTogether"

label: social_support
src_text: I hope you have the best luck figuring it out ♡
augmented_text: You got this! And if you need someone to talk to, I'm here for you. 💪🏼☕️

label: social_support
src_text: I can't say anything to change your situation, but don't let the shit people say in here shape your thoughts.
augmented_text: "You're not alone in this! We're all rooting for you and sending our best wishes. Stay strong! 💪"

label: social_support
src_text: Some kind soul here in our sub suggested Sailor Kin-Mokusei (thank you!
augmented_text: "I'm so grateful for our community, always lifting each other up 🙏"

label: social_support
src_text: But if you think you will like it, get it.
augmented_text: "Just wanted to check in and see how you're doing after everything that's happened. You're in my thoughts and prayers! ❤️"

label: social_support
src_text: I understand this is frustrating, but you need to be your own advocate here.
augmented_text: "I totally get how frustrating this must be for you. Let me know if there's anything I can do to support you - even if it's just venting or sending some positive vibes your way!"
